metadata.title: CVE-2014-9650 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: CRLF injection vulnerability in the management plugin in RabbitMQ 2.1.0through 3.4.x before 3.4.1 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary HTTPheaders and conduct HTTP response splitting attacks via the downloadparameter to api/definitions.

criterions.comment: rabbitmq-server: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
